episodes.description: Four ideas to save the world: traditional wisdom of water usage, cutting edge agricultural technology, linking EVs with renewable energy, and building partnerships between foreigners and Japanese.
episodes.subtitle: From Old to New
episodes.title: 100 Ideas to Save the World

episodes.description: Introducing an app for wheelchair users, a program for foreign trainees learning about business, turning adversity into opportunity in the restaurant industry, and a unique food education program.
episodes.subtitle: Working Together
episodes.title: 100 Ideas to Save the World
